description:
Sloth sets out for a hot spring, the café crew takes a trip around the world, and Mr. Hana is confused on what to get Sasako. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Namakemono-kun no Ryokou / Ningyou ni Natta / White Day
Sloth`s Trip / I Became a Doll / White Day
ナマケモノくんの旅行 / 人形になった / ホワイトデー
